channel.title: Dragon Ball DAIMA on CoNime
channel.description: Recent content in Dragon Ball DAIMA on CoNime

item.title: Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 Adds Dragon Ball DAIMA Pack with SS4 Goku & SS3 Vegeta
item.description: The Dragon Ball DAIMA Pack is now available for Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2, adding Super Saiyan 4 Goku (DAIMA) and Super Saiyan 3 Vegeta (DAIMA), plus new costumes, accessories, parallel quests, Super Souls, and loading screens.

item.title: Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO Adds Dragon Ball DAIMA Pack 1 DLC Featuring 8 New Characters
item.description: Bandai Namco releases the Dragon Ball DAIMA Pack 1 DLC for Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO, adding eight new characters—including Goku (Mini) and Vegeta (Mini) up to Super Saiyan 3—as well as new technique-changing outfits for Goku (Mini). Available for Season Pass holders and as a separate purchase on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.
